text: Deo Surya Mandir is one of the Hindu sun temples in Deo, Bihar. The 8th century old temple is believed to be built by God Goldsmiths Vishwkarma. Sun temple at Deo in Aurangabad district is famous for ‘Chhath puja’ congregation. ==References== Category:Hindu temples Category:8th-century establishments in Asia
title: Deo Surya Mandir
